formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For a given nation n and band b: 1) Base annual before discounts: \( \text{Base} = \text{BandD}_{n} \times M_{n,b} \) 2) Apply Single Person Discount (SPD, 25% if eligible): \( \text{AfterSPD} = \text{Base} \times (1 - 0.25 \cdot \mathbf{1}_{SPD}) \) 3) Apply student exemption (if all occupants are full-time students): \( \text{AfterStudents} = \begin{cases} 0, & \text{if students} \\ \text{AfterSPD}, & \text{otherwise} \end{cases} \) 4) Apply Council Tax Reduction (CTR%, 0â€“100): \( \text{Annual} = \text{AfterStudents} \times \left(1 - \frac{\text{CTR}}{100}\right) \) Payment schedules: \( \text{Monthly}_{10} = \frac{\text{Annual}}{10} \), \( \text{Monthly}_{12} = \frac{\text{Annual}}{12} \), \( \text{Weekly} = \frac{\text{Annual}}{52} \)
